Package builder.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DeleteLevelController  
    ExitLevelController
    Controller for navigating from the level creator view to the main menu
    InputNumMovesController
    Controller for inputting the maximum number of moves (for puzzle level)
    InputStarValueController1
    Controller for inputting the score required to achieve one star (not for theme levels).
    InputStarValueController2
    Controller for inputting the score required to achieve two stars (not for theme levels).
    InputStarValueController3
    Controller for inputting the score required to achieve three stars (not for theme levels).
    InputThemeNameController
    Controller for inputting theme name (theme levels only).
    InputThemeWordsController
    Controller for getting words from the themeWordsTextPane
    InputTimeController
    Controller for inputting time (lightning levels only).
    LoadLevelController  
    NewLevelController
    Controller for creating a new level from scratch (transition between main menu and level creator view).
    ResetLevelController
    Controller to reset level creator view (erase all information and reset board).
    SaveLevelController
    Controller to save a level to a file.
    SelectLevelNumController
    Controller to select the level number being worked on (from drop down menu).
    SelectLevelTypeController
    Controller to select level type being worked on (from drop down menu).
    TestResetLevelController  
    ToggleSquareController
    Controller to toggle a square, from in play to not in play or vice versa.
